basics.name: Leandro Morrone
basics.label: Computer engineer specialized in web development and university teacher
basics.summary: With more than 10 years of experience in web development, I've participated in projects of different sizes and disciplines, as a programmer, analyst, data architect or leader. I mainly works with C#, ASP.Net, PHP, Javascript and SQL. Besides being passionate about programming, I like to teach and transmit my knowledge to students and enthusiasts.

work.name: ARTECH
work.summary: Functional analysis, solution design, data modeling, full-stack web and desktop programming, systems integration, staff training. Specialty: Business management systems (sales, operations, quality, reporting). Technologies: C#, ASP.Net Core, Razor, SQL Server, PHP, HTML, CSS, Javascript.

work.name: National University of La Matanza
work.summary: Design, development, maintenance and support of MIeL, an educational web platform to take, teach and manage subjects from a distance at UNLaM. Technologies: PHP, MySQL, HTML, CSS, Javascript.

work.name: National University of La Matanza
work.summary: Tutor in the Transversal Computing chair, blended modality. Content: Windows, internet and Office package (Word, Excel, Power Point). Position: Adjunct Professor.

work.name: Freelance
work.summary: Independent website development for individuals. Technologies: HTML, CSS, Javascript, PHP, MySQL.

education.institution: National University of Tres de Febrero
education.area: Master in Technology and Aesthetics of New Media Art

education.award: Award "To the best engineering graduates from Argentine universities" for the best engineering score at UNLaM in 2014. Awarded by the National Academy of Engineering.

awards.title: To the best engineering graduates from Argentine universities
awards.summary: Best engineering score at UNLaM in 2014.

projects.name: MIeL
projects.description: Acronym in Spanish for Online Interactive Subjects, virtual teaching and learning platform of the UNLaM. +50,000 users.

projects.name: APM Tool
projects.description: ARTECH web system for project management, resource assignments, billing and reporting.

projects.name: Quamel
projects.description: Software for quality and information security management of ISO 9001 and 27001 standards for companies. +100 users

projects.name: Jarvis / Forecast / Collectors
projects.description: Sales order entry and tracking systems, sales projection, purchasing and production for a cosmetic company.

projects.name: Bitcointainer
projects.description: Institutional website for finance focused on cryptocurrency mining.

projects.name: Unìre
projects.description: Institutional website and social network for agency dedicated to finding couples.

projects.name: BG Maker
projects.description: Website to generate backgrounds for designers and other useful tools.

projects.name: Adsadsadsa
projects.description: Experimental music performance and visuals programmed with Pure Data and controlled from Arduino.

projects.name: Hospedador
projects.description: Zoomorphic robotic sculpture whose movement is controlled from a smartphone and uses Theo Jansen's mechanism.

projects.name: Harmony of spheres
projects.description: Sound installation with electronic panels and speakers inspired by the Pythagorean theory of the same name.
